title: 88/209/EEC: Commission Decision of 26 February 1988 approving the accelerated plans for the eradication of leukosis in cattle presented by the Republic of Portugal (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 26 February 1988
approving the accelerated plans for the eradication of leukosis in cattle presented by the Republic of Portugal
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(88/209/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The accelerated plan for the eradication of leukosis in cattle, presented by Portugal is hereby approved.
Portugal shall bring into force by 1 January 1988 the laws, regulations and administrative provisions for implementing the plans referred to in Article 1.
This Decision is addressed to the Portuguese Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 26 February 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 24, 27. 1. 1987, p. 51.
